title: View maps
description: You can view maps and sort information based on different layers.

title: Build maps by combining data from different sources
description: Oskari can be used to connect many different data sources from different interfaces.

title: Analyze geospatial data
description: Oskari is a versatile map service that allows you to view and combine a wide range of geospatial data sets, such as maps and statistics.

title: Participate in open source development
description: Anyone is welcome to join the community and participate in the open source development of Oskari!

title: Create GIS data
description: You can create GIS data with digitizing tools in Oskari.
